ai-mil6.3.11:8.3_0: While going there, he sees that there is no rebirth, old age, and death in the beginning, the middle, or the end of death. And when he sees with the end of all, he sees no death in the beginning, middle and end.

ai-mil6.3.11:9.2_0: In the same way, when those overcome by timidity are unaffected, their mind becomes stabilized. When his body is unaffected, there is no more future lives.
